content:
Congratulations on your new iPad Air and Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra!

The Zagg Rugged Book is a Bluetooth keyboard, and it's designed to be compatible with multiple devices. You can pair it with up to three devices, including your iPad Air, Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra, and even other Bluetooth-enabled devices like a laptop or another tablet.

To pair the Zagg Rugged Book with your Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra, follow these steps:

1. Make sure the keyboard is turned off.
2. Press and hold the Bluetooth button on the keyboard until the LED light starts flashing.
3. On your Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra, go to Settings > Connections > Bluetooth.
4. Search for available devices and select "Zagg Rugged Book" from the list.
5. If prompted, enter the pairing code "0000" on the keyboard.
6. Wait for the keyboard to pair with your phone.

Once paired, you can switch between devices by pressing the Bluetooth button on the keyboard and selecting the device you want to connect to.

Keep in mind that the Zagg Rugged Book is optimized for iPads, so you might experience some differences in functionality when using it with your Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra. However, it should still provide a great typing experience.

Enjoy using your Zagg Rugged Book with both your iPad Air and Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra!
